title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
description: Famed Magizoologist Newt Scamanderâ€™s years of adventure and exploration have yielded a work of unparalleled importance, admired by scholars, devoured by young witches and wizards, and even made available to Muggles in the early years of this century. With this dazzling illustrated edition, readers can explore the magical fauna of five continents from the comfort of their own armchairs.
